page_content: The page provides information on how to participate in elections and referendums for Swiss citizens abroad.
The page discusses financial plans and strategies for the Canton of Aargau, focusing on budget cuts and economic policies.
The page provides information on how to apply for financial contributions for spatial planning measures in the Canton of Aargau.
The page discusses a legal complaint filed with the administrative court regarding the Aarau football stadium.
The page offers tips and resources for maintaining mental health, particularly during challenging times.
The page discusses the challenges and principles of long-term digital archiving, including the role of software and hardware.
